room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by A Narrow Escape in Hot Springs
review: My son and I were in the Alice in Wonderland room and had a fabulous time. The owners designed and built the room which was really cool :-).

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by A Narrow Escape in Hot Springs
review: We had never been to an escape room before but decided to try this on vacation. It was so much fun! The owner was so helpful, informative and friendly. We did the Wonderland room. We had to solve puzzles and clues to find Alice's necklace. We would definitely do this again.

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by A Narrow Escape in Hot Springs
review: Just finished WonderLand with family of 6, kids aged 7, 11, 15 and 16 and we all had a blast. The room was perfectly suited for us as beginners and although we had some help along the way, managed to solve the room with time to spare. Kids can't stop talking about it. Highly recommend for families seeking some quality time and memories!

room_title: Escape room "Wonderland" by A Narrow Escape in Hot Springs
review: We are here on spring break with our family, girls ages 10 and 8. We have never been to an Escape room before so we decided to give it a try. We did the Alice in Wonderland room! We had a blast and great family fun!
